dimension: overall (Not trimmed): 41 1/2 x 49 1/2 in. (105.41 x 125.73 cm)
title: Hills Of Home *
text: When Larsen introduced Hills of Home in the early 1970s, this dramatic landscape print made a bold statement. Winston Prints, in Lebanon, Pennsylvania, printed the pattern on handwoven silk fabric imported from India. Normally four screens were used, but if a custom ground fabric was used, manufacturers added an additional screen. Hills of Home was discontinued in 1992.
description: Landscape with hills and trees. Vertical repeat 37\". Tobacco, grey, cream Honey
